messages.title: Letterboxd Rate Limiting
messages.body: We've recently had an issue with Letterboxd implementing aggresive rate limiting which caused the Unfollower Finder to stop working. This has been resolved after 2 days and hopefully it was a one off anomaly. Please limit your scans to one a day for now to avoid further issues.

messages.title: Welcome to the News Feed
messages.body: We have added a news section to keep you updated on new features, patch notes, and known issues directly within the extension.
